attributes.action: ON PAPER NOTE REMEMBER THE NHS STAFF &  MANY PEOPLE WHO HAVE DIED FROM COVID19.
attributes.additional_details: The Government must also acknowledged the importance of  NHS
attributes.background: The government must add some type of a picture on the new money notes remembering the nhs staff and many people who have died from this pandemic COVID19.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here:
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
